author: Laura Prudom
title: Here's What the Cast of The Boys Are Watching While Stuck at Home
description: We asked the cast and showrunner of Amazon's The Boys what they're watching, reading, and playing to keep themselves entertained. Here's what The Boys are binging right now.
content: Many of us have found ourselves with a lot more time on our hands lately, including the actors, writers, and directors behind some of our favorite TV and movie productions. If youre looking for recommendations for some of the best TV shows and movies to watch… [+15772 chars]
